name: CYNOROID GAIDEN
description:
"CYNOROID GAIDEN" is the Free-aiming platformer.
Old school & Bloody action- shooter.
If you like the MS-DOS free-aiming shooter ,Let's play "CYNOROID GAIDEN".

You can use 6 weapons, so switch & fire them by your Insanity.
They're blade, hand gun, A-rifle, shotgun, G-Launcher, L-V.

4 dungeons - 20 levels waiting you !!!

Shoot.
And Slash them!!

////////////////////////////////////////////////
Story

No.19827.
He is cloning trooper.
Go to the dungeon, for eternal war.

Killing and killed by the mercy field.
